005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.regex.RegexUtil;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.regex.RegularExpressionMetapathException;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.regex.Pattern;
023import java.util.regex.PatternSyntaxException;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
027
028/**
029 * Implements <a href=
030 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-matches">fn:matches</a>.
031 */
032public final class FnMatches {
033  private static final String NAME = "matches";
034  @NonNull
035  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
036      .name(NAME)
037      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
038      .deterministic()
039      .contextIndependent()
040      .focusIndependent()
041      .argument(IArgument.builder()
042          .name("input")
043          .type(IStringItem.class)
044          .zeroOrOne()
045          .build())
046      .argument(IArgument.builder()
047          .name("pattern")
048          .type(IStringItem.class)
049          .one()
050          .build())
051      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
052      .returnOne()
053      .functionHandler(FnMatches::executeTwoArg)
054      .build();
055
056  @NonNull
057  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_THREE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
058      .name(NAME)
059      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
060      .deterministic()
061      .contextIndependent()
062      .focusIndependent()
063      .argument(IArgument.builder()
064          .name("input")
065          .type(IStringItem.class)
066          .zeroOrOne()
067          .build())
068      .argument(IArgument.builder()
069          .name("pattern")
070          .type(IStringItem.class)
071          .one()
072          .build())
073      .argument(IArgument.builder()
074          .name("flags")
075          .type(IStringItem.class)
076          .one()
077          .build())
078      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
079      .returnOne()
080      .functionHandler(FnMatches::executeThreeArg)
081      .build();
082
083  @NonNull
084  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> executeTwoArg(
085      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull IFunction function,
086      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
087      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
088      @SuppressWarnings("unused") IItem focus) {
089    IStringItem input = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
090    IStringItem pattern = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
091
092    return execute(input, pattern, IStringItem.valueOf(""));
093  }
094
095  @NonNull
096  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> executeThreeArg(
097      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull IFunction function,
098      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
099      @SuppressWarnings("unused") @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
100      @SuppressWarnings("unused") IItem focus) {
101    IStringItem input = FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true));
102    IStringItem pattern = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
103    IStringItem flags = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(FunctionUtils.asTypeOrNull(arguments.get(2).getFirstItem(true)));
104
105    return execute(input, pattern, flags);
106  }
107
108  @NonNull
109  private static ISequence<IBooleanItem> execute(
110      @Nullable IStringItem input,
111      @NonNull IStringItem pattern,
112      @NonNull IStringItem flags) {
113    return input == null
114        ? ISequence.empty()
115        : ISequence.of(
116            IBooleanItem.valueOf(
117                fnMatches(input.asString(), pattern.asString(), flags.asString())));
118  }
119
120  /**
121   * Implements <a href=
122   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-matches">fn:matches</a>.
123   *
124   * @param input
125   *          the string to match against
126   * @param pattern
127   *          the regular expression to use for matching
128   * @param flags
129   *          matching options
130   * @return {@code true} if the pattern matches or {@code false} otherwise
131   */
132  public static boolean fnMatches(@NonNull String input, @NonNull String pattern, @NonNull String flags) {
133    try {
134      return Pattern.compile(pattern, RegexUtil.parseFlags(flags))
135          .matcher(input).find();
136    } catch (PatternSyntaxException ex) {
137      throw new RegularExpressionMetapathException(
138          RegularExpressionMetapathException.INVALID_EXPRESSION,
139          "Invalid regular expression pattern: '" + pattern + "'",
140          ex);
141    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
142      throw new RegularExpressionMetapathException(
143          RegularExpressionMetapathException.INVALID_FLAG,
144          "Invalid regular expression flags: '" + flags + "'",
145          ex);
146    }
147  }
148
149  private FnMatches() {
150    // disable construction
151  }
152}
